Hall of Fame Batting and Pitching Statistics

Source: R/data.R
hof_batting.Rd

Career batting and pitching statistics for players inducted in the baseball Hall of Fame

Usage

hof_batting

hof_pitching

Format

Player

player name

HR

career home runs

AB

career at-bats

From

first season in MLB

To

last season in MLB

OBP

career on-base percentage

SLG

career slugging percentage

OPS

career OPS statistic

Rk

A ranking number

X2

player name

Inducted

year inducated in HOF

Yrs

length of career

From

first year in MLB

To

final year in MLB

ASG

number of all-star game appearances

WAR

career WAR measure

W

career wins

L

career losses

W.L.

winning fraction

ERA

career ERA

G

career games

GS

career games started

GF

career games finished

CG

complete games

SHO

shutouts

SV

saves

IP

innings pitched

H

hits allowed

R

runs allowed

ER

earned runs allowed

HR

home runs allowed

BB

walks

IBB

intentional walks

SO

strikeouts

HBP

hit by pitches

BK

balks

WP

wild pitches

BF

batters faced

Source

Baseball-Reference
